article_title: Monsoon to Withdraw From India Starting Next Week
article_text:
MUMBAI—The monsoon that brought heavy rains to India this year will likely withdraw from the country's northwest starting Monday, the India Meteorological Department said Friday.

This year, the monsoon rains arrived on the mainland June 1 and covered most of the country by mid-June, its fastest pace in over half a century. The monsoon's rapid advance helped farmers increase the area under summer-sown crops substantially, raising hopes...
